subject: Add delivery/read indicators, notifications, and bulk message reveal
body:
- Add delivered_at and read_at timestamps to messages table
- Show ✓ (sent), ✓✓ (delivered), ✓✓ (read) indicators on sender messages
- Implement cross-platform push notifications (native + web)
  - expo-notifications for iOS/Android
  - Web Notifications API for browsers
  - Permission banner on home screen
- Add "Reveal All" button to mark all unread messages as read at once
- Update badge count to show unread messages per chat
- Add markMessagesDelivered() and markAllMessagesRead() functions
- Update documentation with new features
title: Add delivery/read indicators, notifications, and bulk message reveal
